projects.name: Nihon Nomad Travel Agency
projects.description: The aim was to create a landing page for a product of our choice. I chose to create a fake Japan travel Agency. For this project, I used only my own photos, and I wanted to integrate a slider and parallax effects.

projects.name: JLPT Documentation Page
projects.description: The aim was to create a technical documentation page on a subject of our choice. I chose the Japanese Language Proficiency Test, an examination I took three times already. I successfully passed the N2 level (equivalent to a B2-C1 understanding level). I integrated charts and wanted to create a day-night mode switch button for this project.

projects.name: Ogawa Yôko Tribute Page
projects.description: The aim was to create a tribute page for a person of our choice. I chose Ogawa Yôko, a famous japanese author on which I did my Master thesis intitulated " The Diary of Anne Frank as inspiration for The Memory Police by Ogawa Yôko. Places of memory in a totalitarian regime." I tried working with the DeepL API for this project.
